price: Daangaa darbitoota dilaawoo cufa ta’e malee namni isa kijibsiisu hin jiru.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
